data.title: 1/2 Sheet Hungarian Movie Poster
data.meta_description: The extremely rare Hungarian stlye 'C' poster for the classic star-studded disaster film - the Titanic of the skyscrapers. Tagline: '135 floors in flames!'
data.text:
More posters

The Towering Inferno - 1/2 Sheet Hungarian Movie Poster - Style "C"

The extremely rare Hungarian stlye "C" poster for the classic star-studded disaster film - the Titanic of the skyscrapers. Tagline: "135 floors in flames!"

Original title -

The Towering Inferno

Year / Country - 1974 / USA

Genre - Thriller, Drama

Director - John Guillermin

Starring -

Paul Newman, Faye Dunaway, O.J. Simpson, Jennifer Jones, Richard Chamberlain, Susan Blakely, Fred Astaire, William Holden, Steve McQueen

Poster title - Pokoli torony

Designer - Unknown artist

Dimensions- 17" x 11"

Condition -

Near mint. Folded, no tape marks, no pin holes, sharp edges.

Related posters - From the same designer, same director, etc
